name: Fowl City
description:
You are a chicken mobster. Receive missions. Fight through hordes of gangster penguins and take down mob bosses. Use Phone Booths for mission info.

Controls -

1) Tap and hold to move the character.

2) Straight swipe for normal attack and circular swipe for AOE attack.

3) Press the buttons to activate weapons when you find them.

4) Straight swipe to use the tommy gun and tap a location to use the rocket launcher.
